meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the shape of short tubes with diagonally cut ends.
meanings.sent1: I cooked the penne for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The penne pasta was delicious with the creamy sauce.
meanings.sent3: The penne rolled off the plate and onto the floor, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as curly as a bowl of uncooked penne.
meanings.sent5: The penne tubes looked like little tunnels on the plate.

meanings.definition: A penne pasta dish typically made with tomato sauce and cheese.
meanings.sent1: Mom's penne recipe always includes lots of cheese.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the penne with tomato sauce at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The penne dish was so cheesy, it made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the penne dish filled the entire kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The penne pasta was like a warm hug on a cold day.

meanings.definition: A penne pasta salad with vegetables and dressing.
meanings.sent1: I prefer penne pasta salad over regular pasta salad.
meanings.sent2: The penne salad was a refreshing choice for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The penne salad was so colorful, it looked like a rainbow in a bowl.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the penne salad danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the vegetables in the penne salad added a delightful texture.
